column5: Hey all, just curious to see how many people have fished Big Creek this time of year for rainbows, and had success? I am going to try saturday morning for the first time. Is it worth trying, or should I stick to huron tribs?   Thanks for any input!!  P.s. I am already aware of the regs for Big Creek.
Last time I went I saw a guy walking out with two colored up dropbacks on a stringer. We didn't get any. Good luck
That's not a creek you fish when the water is low...
Haven't they all been speared out of there....oh wait, wrong creek....
New regs don't list big creek in year round open season. Instead they have it listed as extended fall season.  Or am I missing something?
I just checked again. Not in the exceptions. In "additional opportunities"
Oh, my bad. i was WAY off.
